thread.title: Donald Trump 'thinking seriously' about proposed US embassy move to Jerusalem | The Independent
thread.title_full: Donald Trump 'thinking seriously' about proposed US embassy move to Jerusalem | The Independent

author: Bethan Mckernan
title: Donald Trump 'thinking seriously' about proposed US embassy move to Jerusalem | The Independent
text:
Friday 10 February 2017 10:28 GMT Click to followThe Independent Online 
US President Donald Trump has said he is "thinking seriously" about moving the country's embassy to Israel from Tel Aviv to Jerusalem. 
The city is contested by Israel and the Palestinians, who both claim it as their capital. Palestinian officials have been outraged by the proposal, which Palestinian Authority President Mahmoud Abbas warned could "open the gates of hell" by sparking violence. 
Since taking office Mr Trump's administration had approached the campaign promise with caution. 
More follows
